package JavaTutorial;

public class JavaTutorial_swapping_4_veriables_without_temp {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int fn=1;
		int sn=2;
		int tn=3;
		int ln=4;
		
		System.out.println("Before Swapping:->");
		System.out.println("fn: " + fn + " sn: " + sn +" tn: "+ tn +" ln: "+fn+"");
		
		System.out.println("After Swapping:->");
		System.out.println("fn: " + sn + " sn: " + tn +" tn: "+ ln +" ln: "+fn+"");

	}

}
